“Have faith God… whatever you ask in prayer, believe that you have received it, and it will be yours. And whenever you stand praying forgive, if you have anything against any one’ so that your father also who is in heaven may forgive you trespasses."
About St Anthony and the devotion

"St. Anthony is a companion in daily life. He not only bestows graces and favours whenever one calls him in times of need. He is a big brother, a confidant who is always present and available whenever we are assailed by problems, be they big or small. Devotees ask him to help those who have lost their way, to console the suffering, to assist the poor and the forsaken.\nAs well as through personal prayer, devotion to Saint Anthony has manifested itself over the centuries in enduring ways."
"Confess your sins to one another, and pray for one another, that you may be healed. The prayer of a righteous man has great over in it is effects"
"love your enemies, bless them that curse your, do good to them that hate you, and pray for them which despitefully use you, and persecute you"
I have been using Guild of St. Anthony app and I think you may like it. Check it out from your Android phone: %s
